title: DELMADE Hydraulic Bale Handler / Hay Unroller

tasks.task: Driving a tractor to mow a hayfield
subtasks: Operate the steering wheel to maneuver the tractor
Use the hydraulic controls to lower and raise the mower
Engage the power take-off (PTO) to run the mower
Adjust the mower deck height as needed
Operate the baler to collect cut hay
Secure the hay bales once formed
Drive the tractor to the hay storage area
Unload the hay bales from the tractor
Position the trailer adjacent to the tractor
Attach the trailer to the tractor using the implements
Use a lift gate or similar mechanism to load hay onto trailer
Secure the hay on the trailer to prevent shifting
Detach the trailer from the tractor
Drive the tractor and trailer to the destination
Unload the trailer carefully to avoid damage to the hay
